H0.text: The Himalayas and Tien Shan, or Tian Shan, lie north and south of which other major mountain range. Karakoram

H1.text: The Himalayas and Tien Shan, or Tian Shan, lie north and south of which other major mountain range. Kunlun Mountains

H2.text: The Himalayas and Tien Shan, or Tian Shan, lie north and south of which other major mountain range. Pamir Mountains

H3.text: The Himalayas and Tien Shan, or Tian Shan, lie north and south of which other major mountain range. Arkatag

A4.text: The Karakoram is bounded on the north by the Yarkand and Karakash rivers, beyond which lie the Kunlun Mountains.

A5.text: The southern boundary of the Karakoram is formed by rivers that separate it from the north-western end of the Himalaya.

A6.text: To the south, it connects with the Pamir Mountains
